sql-select.name: GetDatabaseUserObjectsCount
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[xtype] AS [TypeDesc] ,COUNT(*) AS [TypeCount] ,MIN(tSO.[crdate]) AS [CreateDateMin] ,MAX(tSO.[crdate]) AS [CreateDateMax] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO WHERE OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 GROUP BY tSO.[xtype] ORDER BY tSO.[xtype];

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSO.[type_desc] AS [TypeDesc] ,COUNT(*) AS [TypeCount] ,MIN(tSO.[create_date]) AS [CreateDateMin] ,MAX(tSO.[create_date]) AS [CreateDateMax] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO WHERE OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 GROUP BY tSO.[type_desc] ORDER BY tSO.[type_desc];
